ecologia.description: For a school project, we had to create a wordpress theme about ecology.

graduationVideo.description: I had the opportunity to work with the ex-director of HETIC (Jean-Christophe BEAUX) to create and edit the graduation video for the 2017's promotion of HETIC.

hypatos.description: During my internship at Taikonauten, I made the development of the new website of Hypatos.

supertrash.description: For this generative design project, we have created a site dedicated to Supertrash's event service. Do you want to be helped in the processing of your waste for your festival? Supertrash will offer you a unique design for your trash cans that will be placed in the festival.

vendredi.description: Since 2020, I'm part of the great adventure "Vendredi". I work as a full stack web developer to improve the engagment plateform!

weisserRing.description: During my internship at Taikonauten, I worked on a winter animation for Weisser Ring. This animation may not appear if it's not winter time ‚ùÑÔ∏è
weisserRing.title: Weisser Ring - Winter animation

wizer.description: We had to create a product for a school projet about reading. We decided to think about an app which facilitate the storing the data of an article. I developed a mini-site to present this application project.
wizer.title: Mini site for an app
